definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (cf. inscr. in RA:1867, pl. 7, Dr:Sm xxiii; Nö:ZMG 1886, 162 ‘pointing —[[ֵ]] to avoid offence;’ but Nbr:Acad. 1887, Dec. 17 comp. Talm. & Targum ([[חַזּוּרָא]], [[חֵיזוּר]], [[חֲזוּרָא]] etc.) pomegranate (and apple; Syr. h.zuwr, h.zurwo0), cf. [[בְּנֵי רִמּוֹן]] 2Sa 4:2, 2Sa 4:5, 2Sa 4:9)—
a priest of 17th course (assigned to David's time) 1Ch 24:15; LXX Chcein (16th, v:1Ch 24:14), but A Ieceir, LXXL Chceir.
one of those sealed Ne 10:21; LXX Hceir, LXXL Achr.
